DOC.brief_title: The Synchronized Trial Expectant Mothers With Depressive Symptoms Omega-3 PUFAs ( SYNCHRO ) : Open Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Maternal depression significant harmful influence mother child . Considering possibility adverse effect antidepressant previous meta-analyses show positive effect omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid ( PUFAs ) supplementation reduce depressive symptom , omega-3 PUFAs may provide safe strategy . The investigator evaluate efficacy safety omega-3 PUFAs pregnant woman depressive symptom .
DOC.criteria: 1. pregnant woman age 20 year old 2. 1224 week gestation 3. Japanese conversational ability Japan site Mandarin conversational ability Taiwan site understand scope present trial provide write consent study participation 4. plan return hospital checkup 46 week childbirth 5. Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale ( EPDS ) score 9 6. good physical health judge obstetrician . 1. history current suspicion psychosis bipolar I disorder substancerelated disorder eat disorder personality disorder 2. item EPDS concern suicide ideation 2 3. serious psychiatric symptom selfharm behavior need rapid psychiatric treatment 4. difficult expect normal birth ( ex : fetal malformation etc . ) 5. history bleed disorder von Willebrand 's Disease 6. regular treatment aspirin warfarin within last 3 month 7. smoke habit ≥40 cigarette per day 8. regular treatment ethyl icosapentate regular consumption omega3 PUFA supplement within last 3 month 9. habit eat fish ≥4 time per week .
